TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EditorPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class EditorPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 做為位於 區域中之控制項的基底類別，是用來編輯 控制項。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones and are used to edit controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別提供一組基本的屬性和方法，可由衍生提供使用 Web 組件控制項集合，而是由自訂控制項控制項。The class provides a base set of properties and methods that are used by the derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set, and by custom controls. 控制項可讓使用者編輯相關聯藉由修改其版面配置、 外觀、 屬性、 行為或其他特性的控制項。An control allows a user to edit an associated control by modifying its layout, appearance, properties, behavior, or other characteristics. 編輯使用者介面 (UI)，其中包含區域，其中包含控制項、 Web 頁面進入編輯模式後，會出現。The editing user interface (UI), which consists of zones that contain controls, is displayed after a Web page enters edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 控制項只能用於衍生自區域類別，例如控制項。An control can be used only within a zone that derives from the class, such as the control. 頁面進入編輯模式後，使用者可以選取編輯，請按一下 編輯動詞命令，在選取之控制項的動詞命令功能表上的控制項。After a page has entered edit mode, a user can select a control to edit by clicking an edit verb on the verbs menu of the selected control. 只有一個可以一次編輯控制項。Only one control can be edited at a time. 數個衍生控制項提供 Web 組件控制項集合中下, 表所示。Several derived controls are provided with the Web Parts control set, as listed in the following table. 這些控制項提供所需的大部分的應用程式的所有編輯功能。These controls provide all the editing capabilities that are necessary for most applications. 在 Web 組件頁面中使用這些控制項的一般方法是將它們宣告內的頁面保存格式``項目，其中``是子元素``項目。The typical approach for using these controls in a Web Parts page is to declare them in page persistence format within a `` element, where `` is the child element of an `` element. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱本主題的範例 > 一節。For a code example, see the Example section of this topic. |控制項類型Type of control|描述Description| |---------------------|-----------------| ||編輯關聯的控制項，包括屬性，例如其標題文字、 高度、 寬度和框線屬性的外觀。Edits the appearance of the associated control, including properties such as its title text, height, width, and border attributes.| ||編輯關聯的控制項，例如是否可以編輯、 是否予以關閉，或是否可移到另一個區域的特定行為。Edits certain behaviors of the associated control, such as whether it can be edited, whether it can be closed, or whether it can be moved to another zone. 這個控制項才會顯示在頁面上的共用的個人化範圍中所編輯的控制項時。This control is only visible on a page when a control is being edited in shared personalization scope.| ||編輯版面配置屬性相關聯的控制項，例如它是否是在一般或最小化 （摺疊） 狀態，以及哪些區域會放在。Edits layout attributes for the associated control, such as whether it is in a normal or minimized (collapsed) state, and what zone it is placed in.| ||編輯屬性關聯的控制項，這些屬性已宣告於原始程式碼`WebBrowsable`屬性。Edits properties of the associated control, if those properties were declared in the source code with a `WebBrowsable` attribute.| > [!NOTE] > 若要改善協助工具，所有控制項提供內轉譯 Web 組件控制集`
`項目。To improve accessibility, all the controls provided in the Web Parts control set are rendered within a `
` element. `
`項目群組相關之控制項集合中用來在編輯指定控制項，以及它可協助視覺化使用者代理程式 （例如，一般的網頁瀏覽器） 和語音導向的使用者代理程式在這些控制項之間的索引標籤式瀏覽（例如，螢幕讀取軟體）。The `
` element groups the related set of controls used for editing in a given control, and it facilitates tabbed navigation among those controls for both visual user agents (such as ordinary Web browsers) and speech-oriented user agents (such as screen-reading software). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範宣告式和以程式設計方式使用控制項。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of controls. 此程式碼範例包含四個部分：This code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含網頁控制，使用數個從該區域，以及自訂的參考中設定宣告的 Web 組件控制項的控制項控制項。A Web page that contains an control, with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and a reference to a custom control. - 包含自訂的類別控制項，以及自訂編輯中的屬性控制項控制項。A class that contains the custom control, and a custom control for editing a property in the control. - 在瀏覽器頁面載入時，此範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#14)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#14)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 它包含的宣告式參考控制項，且具有子系``元素，其中包含兩個 Web 組件控制項集合的宣告式參考控制項。It contains a declarative reference to an control, with a child `` element that contains declarative references to two of the Web Parts control set controls. 頁面也會參考自訂控制，請使用`Register`指示詞組件，而``控制項項目。The page also references a custom control, using a `Register` directive for the assembly, and the `` element for the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/editorpart_overview_cs.aspx#12)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/editorpart_overview_vb.aspx#12)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是自訂名為類別`TextDisplayWebPart`。The third part of the code example is a custom class named `TextDisplayWebPart`. 此類別會實作介面。The class implements the interface. 這個類別是巢狀的私用類別，包含程式碼的私用類別相關聯`TextDisplayWebPart`類別和名為`TextDisplayEditorPart`。Within this class is a nested, private class that contains the code for a private class associated with the `TextDisplayWebPart` class and named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 在執行階段，作為`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項進入編輯模式，在其`TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts`方法，它會建立的執行個體`TextDisplayEditorPart`類別，並顯示在控制項，以及其他控制項。At run time, as the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode, in its `TextDisplayWebPart.CreateEditorParts` method, it creates an instance of the `TextDisplayEditorPart` class, and displays it in the control, along with the other controls. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#1)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#1)] 網頁瀏覽器，並在載入**顯示模式**控制項中，選取**編輯模式**切換到編輯模式。Load the page in a browser, and on the **Display Mode** control, select **Edit Mode** to switch to edit mode. 按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯 UI 顯示時，您可以看到三個控制項，包括可讓您編輯自訂一個`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`屬性。When the editing UI is visible, you can see three controls, including the custom one that enables you to edit the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. 如果您進行一些變更編輯 UI 並按一下**套用** 按鈕，您可以使用下拉式清單控制項返回頁面，即可瀏覽模式，並查看完整的編輯變更影響。If you make some changes in the editing UI and click the **Apply** button, you can use the drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode and see the full effect of the editing changes.

para.span: 若要建立自訂控制項，您必須覆寫兩個重要的方法。

span.span: To create a custom control, you must override two important methods.

para.span: 方法會套用至編輯器控制項中所做的變更控制正在編輯。

span.span: The method applies changes made in the editor control to the control being edited.

para.span: 方法會取得目前的值控制所編輯，以便編輯器控制項可以編輯它們。

span.span: The method gets the current values of the control being edited, so that the editor control can edit them.

para.span: 使用這兩個重要的方法，您取得和設定的值之間自訂控制項和它正在編輯的控制項。

span.span: Using these two critical methods, you get and set values between your custom control and the control it is editing.

para.span: 如果您衍生自類別來建立自訂編輯器控制項，您可以加入您的自訂控制項藉由實作區域介面中控制項、 使用者控制項或伺服器控制項。

span.span: If you derive from the class to create custom editor controls, you can add your custom controls to an zone by implementing the interface in a control, a user control, or a server control.

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。

span.span: For more details and a code example, see the class overview.

para.span: 此外，範例一節中的程式碼範例示範如何實作在自訂控制項。

span.span: Also, the code example in the Example section demonstrates how to implement in a custom control.
Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 此建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ApplyChanges() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function ApplyChanges () As Boolean

summary.span: 將值從 控制項儲存至相關聯 控制項中對應的屬性。

span.span: Saves the values in an control to the corresponding properties in the associated control.

returns.span: 如果將值從 控制項儲存至 控制項的動作順利進行，則為 ，否則 (如果發生錯誤) 為 。

span.span: if the action of saving values from the control to the control is successful; otherwise (if an error occurs), .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個重要的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on an control. 它定義為抽象方法在類別，而且必須實作繼承的控制項。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 方法的目的是要儲存的使用者輸入的值控制項中的對應屬性中所參考的控制項屬性。The method's purpose is to save the values a user has entered into an control to the corresponding properties in the control that is referenced in the property. 方法在使用者按一下按鈕，表示 確定 或 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 中的套用動詞命令時呼叫。The method is called when the user clicks a button representing an OK or an apply verb in the editing user interface (UI). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法，在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範實作方法，在自訂名為類別`TextDisplayEditorPart`。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 這個方法會取得相關聯的參考`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用屬性。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 然後更新的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`屬性。It then updates the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#5)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分示範如何相關聯控制項中， `TextDisplayWebPart`，建立的集合相關聯控制項 (在此情況下，有一個只控制項，名為`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中它的實作方法。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 在執行此方法時`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項進入編輯模式。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 衍生自類別類別必須實作方法。

span.span: A class that derives from the class must implement the method.

para.span: 實作的方法取得關聯的控制項使用的參考屬性，然後在最新的值更新該控制項的屬性控制項。

span.span: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the property, and then updates the properties of that control with the current values in the control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Display As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Display { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出當與控制項相關聯的 控制項處於編輯模式時，是否應該顯示該控制項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether a control should be displayed when its associated control is in edit mode.

value.span: 布林值，指出是否應該顯示控制項。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the control should be displayed.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中編輯的特定點處理，包含的區域控制檢查屬性來判斷是否要顯示的控制項。At certain points in the editing process, the zone that contains an control checks the property to determine whether to display the control. 有兩種案例其中屬性會傳回`false`而不顯示控制項。There are two scenarios where the property returns `false` and the control is not displayed. 正在編輯的控制項時，就會發生第一個案例控制項。The first scenario occurs when the control being edited is a control. 當正在編輯的控制項時，就會發生第二個案例及其和屬性設為`true`，而網頁的個人化範圍會設定在使用者層級。The second scenario occurs when the control being edited has its and properties set to `true`, while the page's personalization scope is set at user level.

span.span: Web Parts Personalization Overview
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，該字串含有 控制項標題列中所顯示的標題文字。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the title text displayed in the title bar of an control.

value.span: 字串，表示控制項的完整可見標題。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.

value.span: .NET Framework 會提供已計算之特定文化特性的字串做為預設值。

span.span: The default value is a calculated, culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回之目前值的基底屬性或，如果控制項沒有標題，導出值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 導出的值是由可當地語系化的資源字串未命名的控制項所組成。The calculated value consists of a localizable resource string for untitled controls. 不指定任何值給萬一屬性中的值屬性不同於屬性。In the cases where no value is assigned to the property, the value of the property differs from the property. 因為屬性設計成唯讀，導出的屬性，即可取得顯示項目的目前實際的值在執行階段，請勿嘗試使用這個屬性來設定的標題控制項。Because the property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time, do not attempt to use this property to set a title for an control. 若要設定標題，請使用 基底屬性。To set a title, use the base property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetDesignModeState() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetDesignModeState () As IDictionary

summary.span: 擷取 控制項之父區域的目前狀態。

span.span: Retrieves the current state of an control's parent zone.

returns.span: ，具有 區域的目前狀態，該區域含有 控制項。

span.span: An that has the current state of the zone that contains an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回包含之區域的狀態資訊控制項。The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains an control. 字典的表單中，會傳回狀態資訊。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了呼叫基底方法中，方法也會檢查屬性。In addition to calling the base method, the method also checks the property. 如果值為`false`，這表示，應該不會顯示控制項，則屬性也設為`false`。If the value is `false`, meaning that the control should not be displayed, then the property is also set to `false`.

exception.span: 包含 控制項的 為 。

span.span: The that contains the control is .
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void SetDesignModeState(class System.Collections.IDictionary data) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub SetDesignModeState (data As IDictionary)

param.name: data
param.span: ，含有狀態資料以供顯示區域。

span.span: An that contains state data for displaying the zone.

summary.span: 將設計模式狀態的特性套用至目前的 區域，這個區域含有 控制項。

span.span: Applies the characteristics of the design-mode state to the current zone that contains an control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SyncChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 從 控制項擷取屬性值，以供相關聯的 控制項使用。

span.span: Retrieves the property values from a control for its associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是一個重要的方法上控制項。The method is a critical method on an control. 它定義為抽象方法在類別，而且必須實作繼承的控制項。It is defined as an abstract method in the class, and must be implemented by inherited controls. 方法的目的是擷取目前的值從中所參考的控制項屬性，並更新中的欄位控制使用這些值，因此使用者可以編輯它們。The purpose of the method is to retrieve the current values from the control referenced in the property, and update the fields in the control with those values so a user can edit them. 方法會呼叫每次在相關聯的值控制項可能已變更。The method is called whenever the values in the associated control might have changed. 針對每個控制項，區域，其中包含控制項呼叫方法後立即呼叫方法，以便中的值控制項永遠會同步處理中的值相關聯控制項。For every control, the zone that contains the control calls the method immediately after calling the method, so that the values in the control are always synchronized with the values in the associated control. 另一種情況其中就會呼叫方法時，控制項進入編輯模式。Another case where the method is called is when a control is entering edit mode. > [!NOTE] > 不會呼叫方法之後方法，如果該方法會傳回`false`，因為在此情況下，發生錯誤。The method is not called after the method if that method returns `false`, because in that case, an error has occurred. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法，在自訂控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to implement the method in a custom control. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 在程式碼範例的第一個部分示範實作方法，在自訂名為類別`TextDisplayEditorPart`。The first part of the code example demonstrates the implementation of the method in the custom class named `TextDisplayEditorPart`. 這個方法會取得相關聯的參考`TextDisplayWebPart`控制使用屬性。This method gets a reference to the associated `TextDisplayWebPart` control using the property. 接著會取得的值`TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle`屬性，以及哪一個項目已選取下拉式清單控制項中的更新 (藉由參考`TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle`屬性) 上自訂控制項。It then gets the value of the `TextDisplayWebPart.FontStyle` property, and updates which item is selected in the drop-down list control (referenced by the `TextDisplayEditorPart.PartContentFontStyle` property) on the custom control. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#6)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分示範如何相關聯控制項中， `TextDisplayWebPart`，建立的集合相關聯控制項 (在此情況下，有一個只控制項，名為`TextDisplayEditorPart`集合中) 中它的實作方法。The second part of the code example shows how the associated control, `TextDisplayWebPart`, creates a collection of associated controls (in this case, there is only one control named `TextDisplayEditorPart` in the collection) in its implementation of the method. 在執行此方法時`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項進入編輯模式。This method is executed when the `TextDisplayWebPart` control enters edit mode. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#4)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPart_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPart_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#4)]

para.span: 衍生自類別類別必須實作方法。

span.span: A class that derives from the class must implement the method.

para.span: 實作的方法取得關聯的控制項使用的參考屬性，然後更新從相關聯的屬性值的控制項控制項。

span.span: The implemented method gets a reference to the associated control using the property, and then updates the control with the property values from the associated control.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartManager As WebPartManager

summary.span: 取得與目前 Web 網頁相關聯 之控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control associated with the current Web page.
A reference to the on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項需要的參考執行個體，因為它就必須檢查頁面，來決定的值的目前個人化範圍屬性。An control needs a reference to the instance because it must check the current personalization scope of the page to determine the value of the property. 個人化範圍取決於檢查屬性，存取透過屬性。Personalization scope is determined by checking the property, which is accessed through the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property WebPartToEdit As WebPart

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得對目前正在編輯之 控制項的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the control that is currently being edited.
A that is currently in edit mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項 （或其他伺服器或使用者控制項） 比目前正在編輯的值會對應屬性。The control (or other server or user control) that is currently being edited corresponds to the value of the property. 只有一個可以編輯控制項，一次，以及當控制項處於編輯模式，屬性提供該控制項的參考。Only one control can be edited at a time, and when a control is in edit mode, the property provides a reference to that control. 之後區域已新增控制項到它的控制項的集合，然後指派自己的值屬性設屬性控制項。After the zone has added the control to its collection of controls, it then assigns the value of its own property to the property on the control. 控制項會使用屬性，尤其是其兩個重要的方法-和-取得和設定相關聯的控制項上的屬性值。An control uses the property especially in its two critical methods-- and --to get and set the property values on the associated control.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Zone As EditorZoneBase

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得包含 控制項之 區域的參考。

span.span: Gets a reference to the zone that contains an control.
An that contains the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然屬性是唯讀的它會提供包含的區域物件的參考控制項，以及您可以以程式設計方式變更區域本身上的屬性值。Although the property is read-only, it provides a reference to the zone object that contains the control, and you can programmatically change property values on the zone itself.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls
